com.labyrinth.game.modes

Interface GameMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TreasureChase

    public interface GameMode
    Represents a general game mode.
    Version:
    0.1.01042013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the active game board.

      Get the active computer player opponent.

      Get the active player.

    • Method Detail

      • moveTokenUp

        void moveTokenUp()
                 throws IllegalMoveException
        Move the token up a tile.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - Thrown when a wall is encountered.

      • moveTokenDown

        void moveTokenDown()
                   throws IllegalMoveException
        Move the token down a tile.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - Thrown when a wall is encountered.

      • moveTokenLeft

        void moveTokenLeft()
                   throws IllegalMoveException
        Move the token left a tile.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - Thrown when a wall is encountered.

      • moveTokenRight

        void moveTokenRight()
                    throws IllegalMoveException
        Move the token right a tile.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - Thrown when a wall is encountered.

      • rotateTile

        void rotateTile(int angle)
                throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Rotate the spare tile by a particular angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle to rotate the spare tile by.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - When angle is not 90, 180 or 270.

      • insertRow

        Player insertRow(int row,
               Direction direc,
               Player performer)
                 throws IllegalMoveException
        Insert the spare tile into the specified row.
        Parameters:
        row - The row to insert the spare tile into.
        direc - The direction from which to insert the tile into.
        performer - The player who is performing the move.
        Returns:
        The newly updated player with increased score/moves and spare tile based on performer.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - When the move cannot be accomplished due to immovable tiles, etc.

      • insertColumn

        Player insertColumn(int column,
                  Direction direc,
                  Player performer)
                    throws IllegalMoveException
        Insert the spare tile into the specified column.
        Parameters:
        column - The column to insert the spare tile into.
        direc - The direction from which to insert the tile into.
        performer - The player who is performing the move.
        Returns:
        The newly updated player with increased score/moves and spare tile based on performer.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - When the move cannot be accomplished due to immovable tiles, etc.

        Update the player with a new player.
        Parameters:
        p - The new player.
